analysis.description:
ExyToken.name (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#394-396) shadows:

ExyToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#399-405) shadows:
	- ERC223Token.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#14-16)

VestingAllocation.approveAllocation (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#731-737) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(allocationOf[_address].allocationState == Types.AllocationState.Proposed)

VestingAllocation.approveAllocation (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#731-737) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(allocationOf[_address].allocationState == Types.AllocationState.Proposed)
VestingAllocation.proposeAllocation (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#698-729) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(allocationOf[_dest].proposerAddress == 0x0 || allocationOf[_dest].allocationState == Types.AllocationState.Rejected)
	- require(bool)(allocationOf[_dest].proposerAddress == 0x0 || allocationOf[_dest].allocationState == Types.AllocationState.Rejected)

Reentrancy in ExyToken.ExyToken (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#412-449):
	External calls:
	- mint(MARKETING_COST_ADDRESS,MARKETING_COST_TOKENS) (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#443-444)
	- mint(ICO_TOKENS_ADDRESS,ICO_TOKENS) (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#444-445)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#444-445)
	- circulatingSupply (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#444-445)
	- paused (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#444-445)

Reentrancy in ExyToken.ExyToken (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#412-449):
	External calls:
	- mint(MARKETING_COST_ADDRESS,MARKETING_COST_TOKENS) (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#443-444)
	- mint(ICO_TOKENS_ADDRESS,ICO_TOKENS) (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#444-445)
	- mint(SEED_TOKENS_ADDRESS,SEED_TOKENS) (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#446-449)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#446-449)
	- circulatingSupply (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#446-449)
	- paused (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#446-449)
empty in ERC223Token.transferFrom (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#73-74) is a local variable never initialiazed

ExyToken.erc20TokenTransfer (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#452-459) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_dest,token.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#458)

ExyToken.mint (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#612-623) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- circulatingSupply.add(value) > totalSupply (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#617-622)

VestingAllocation.proposeAllocation (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#698-729) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(allocationOf[_dest].proposerAddress == 0x0 || allocationOf[_dest].allocationState == Types.AllocationState.Rejected) (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#715-717)
	- allocationOf[_dest].allocationState != Types.AllocationState.Rejected (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#717-719)

VestingAllocation.approveAllocation (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#731-737) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(allocationOf[_address].allocationState == Types.AllocationState.Proposed) (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#734-735)
	- require(bool)(allocationOf[_address].proposerAddress != _approverAddress) (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#735-736)

ERC223Token.transfer uses assembly (/unique_chucks/2/0x5c743a35e903f6c584514ec617acee0611cf44f3.sol#22-41)
